description: Variation of Conditions 25 (design stage BREEAM certificate) and 26 (BREEAM post construction certificate) of planning permission ref. 17/01701/FUL (Demolition of 2 existing properties (2 & 4 Hercules Road) and construction of eight storey development with two basement levels to create flexible A1 and A3 use class at ground and basement level and 8 residential dwellings above). Granted on: 22/06/2018.Variation sought:To vary conditions 25 and 26 by omitting the wording of with a score of 63%. due to the planning stage pre-assessment having being undertaken under the BREEAM NC2014 version, and the updated assessment having now been undertaken under the BREEAM NC2018 version.Proposed wording of Condition 25 - Prior to the commencement of above-ground works a design stage BREEAM certificate with a summary score sheet should be submitted to and approved in writing by the local planning authority demonstrating that the development will achieve a minimum rating of Very Good.Proposed wording of Condition 26 - Prior to first occupation of the development a BREEAM post-construction certificate with a summary score sheet should be submitted to and approved in writing by the local planning authority demonstrating that the development has achieved a minimum rating of Very Good.
